name: PHAsset.PlaybackStyle
desc: An enumeration of asset playback styles that dictate how to present an asset to the user.

items.name: case unsupported
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset has an unsupported or undefined media playback type.

items.name: case image
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset should be displayed as a still image.

items.name: case imageAnimated
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset should be displayed as an animated image.

items.name: case livePhoto
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset should be displayed as a Live Photo.

items.name: case video
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset should be displayed as a video.

items.name: case videoLooping
items.desc: An enumeration indicating that the asset should be displayed as a looping video.
